• Mobile-optimized controls with D-pad and action buttons for touch devices.
  • Procedurally generated world with mining, building, and multiplayer support.
  • Real-time multiplayer via MQTT broker with chat, transfer, and admin features.
  • Persistent save system using IndexedDB with import/export functionality.
  • Shop system for upgrades, consumables, and vehicle customization.

This is a multiplayer mining game with mobile controls, real-time networking, and persistent saves. Players can mine resources, build structures, trade with others, and upgrade their equipment. The game features a procedurally generated world, day/night cycles, and admin tools for server management.
